0:["7APd1jHjjHmSpaq1dZmCU",[[["",{"children":["lesson",{"children":["tailwind",{"children":["layout",{"children":["aspect-ratio",{"children":["__PAGE__",{}]}]}]}]}]},"$undefined","$undefined",true],["",{"children":["lesson",{"children":["tailwind",{"children":["layout",{"children":["aspect-ratio",{"children":["__PAGE__",{},[["$L1",["$","div",null,{"children":[[["$","h1","h1-0",{"children":"Aspect Ratio"}],"\n",["$","p","p-0",{"children":["https://tailwindcss.com/docs/aspect-ratio#basic-usage\r\nUtilities for controlling the ",["$","code","code-0",{"children":"aspect ratio"}],"(宽高比) of an element."]}],"\n",["$","h2","h2-0",{"children":"Class"}],"\n",["$","p","p-1",{"children":"Properties\r\naspect-auto\t    aspect-ratio: auto;\r\naspect-square\taspect-ratio: 1 / 1;\r\naspect-video\taspect-ratio: 16 / 9;"}],"\n",["$","h3","h3-0",{"children":"Use the aspect-* utilities"}],"\n",["$","p","p-2",{"children":"to set the desired(期望) aspect ratio of an element.（元素的宽高比）"}],"\n",["$","pre","pre-0",{"children":["$","code","code-0",{"children":"<iframe class=\"w-full aspect-video ...\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/...\"></iframe>\n"}]}],"\n",["$","h3","h3-1",{"children":"Hover, focus, and other states"}],"\n",["$","p","p-3",{"children":"Tailwind lets you conditionally apply utility classes in different states using variant modifiers. For example, use hover:aspect-square to only apply the aspect-square utility on hover."}],"\n",["$","h3","h3-2",{"children":"Breakpoints and media queries"}],"\n",["$","pre","pre-1",{"children":["$","code","code-0",{"children":"md:aspect-square\r\nhttps://tailwindcss.com/docs/responsive-design\r\nBreakpoint-prefix\tMinimum-width\tCSS\r\nsm\t                640px\t            @media (min-width: 640px) { ... }\r\nmd\t                768px\t            @media (min-width: 768px) { ... }\r\nlg\t                1024px\t            @media (min-width: 1024px) { ... }\r\nxl\t                1280px\t            @media (min-width: 1280px) { ... }\r\n2xl\t                1536px\t            @media (min-width: 1536px) { ... }\n"}]}],"\n",["$","p","p-4",{"children":"You can also use variant modifiers to target media queries like responsive breakpoints, dark mode, prefers-reduced-motion, and more. For example, use md:aspect-square to apply the aspect-square utility at only medium screen sizes and above.\r\nThere are five breakpoints by default, inspired by common device resolutions:"}],"\n","<iframe class=\"w-full aspect-video md:aspect-square\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/...\"/>","\n",["$","h3","h3-3",{"children":"Arbitrary values"}],"\n",["$","p","p-5",{"children":"aspect-[4/3] 自定义宽高比"}],"\n",["$","pre","pre-2",{"children":["$","code","code-0",{"children":"If you need to use a one-off aspect-ratio value that doesn’t make sense to include in your theme, use square brackets to generate a property on the fly using any arbitrary value.\r\n<iframe class=\"w-full aspect-[4/3]\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/...\"></iframe>\n"}]}]],["$","iframe",null,{"className":"w-full aspect-video hover:aspect-square
